properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SENEGAL.
DNC 01.
TUG IBHAYI, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD,
ADRIFT IN 12-40N 17-31W AT 301400Z JAN.
THREE PERSONS REQUIRING MEDICAL ASSISTANCE.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC DAKAR,
PHONE: 2213 3826 5001,
FAX: 2213 3826 5000,
E-MAIL: MARINENAT@ORANGE.SN.
